content.body:
If you can make it to Seattle, please join TC39 for a free evening of talks at Docusign on Thursday 20th Feb.

 https://lu.ma/s97y24jd
what does import source for .node mean? they're compiled binaries
in a world that a `.node` file can be loaded like a `.wasm` file, I think it could have a similar `WebAssembly.Module` representation as `Addon.Module`
content.formatted_body: in a world that a .node file can be loaded like a .wasm file, I think it could have a similar WebAssembly.Module representation as Addon.Module

content.body: now that `.node` file loader does not expose linking phase to JS module loader, I didn't find it useful in practice to expose `.node` source representation
content.formatted_body: now that .node file loader does not expose linking phase to JS module loader, I didn't find it useful in practice to expose .node source representation
